text: Multiple logistic regression analysis revealed that BAL fluid total WBC count $ 510 / mL was an independent predictor of bacterial pneumonia with an adjusted odds ratio of 13 . 5 ( 95 % CI ; 2 . 3 - 80 . 4 ) ( Table 5 ) . There was a modest but significant positive correlation between the degree of BAL leukocytosis and the APACHE II score ( r = 0 . 419 , P = 0 . 05 ) ( Figure 4 ) . Table 3 . Bronchoalveolar lavage total and differential cell counts ( % ) in patients with pneumonia .
